eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Physician diagnosis of asthma
* Receiving treatment with one or more daily controller (i.e., preventive) medications
* Age = 18 years
* Less than 30 pack years of cigarette smoking
* FEVi greater than 50% of predicted
* FEVi bronchodilator response of at least 12%
* Ability to use a telephone without assistance

Exclusion Criteria:

N/A

outcomeMeasures.title: Participants With Unscheduled Asthma-related Visits
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants found to have any unscheduled office visits, emergency room visits, or hospitalizations that are related to asthma during one year.

outcomeMeasures.title: Participants With Oral Corticosteroid Use
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants found to have any use of oral corticosteroids related to asthma during one year
